Cats & Open Dataâ€”Made possible with Google dataset search

This grid map shows the estimated number of cats per 25 square kilometers in Great Britain, as of January 1, 2015 when the cat population was modeled.

Hover or click on a square to see the estimated number of cats, visualized in Internet Cats, where every one Internet Cat equals 100 estimated cats. All values were rounded up to the nearest 100 cats for this Internet Cat Chart.

Sources: Animal and Plant Health Agency, Charles Roper, Cats As A Service, Office for National Statistics & the Scottish Government
